FORGE

Notes to Users

It calculates the net profit and profit per hour generated from crafting items into upgraded version through the forge in the Dwarven Mines.

The prices of the items fluctuate a lot. After forging is finished, the price may be different from now. So there is a risk of suffering from a loss even though the list says you would make a profit.

General Profit

Product
(Profit per forge)		 Materials Time Taken
(Hours)		 Unit cost of material
(Buy instantly, 1% tax)		 Cost of materials
(Buy instantly, 1% tax)		 Price of product
(Sell instantly, 1% tax)		 Net Profit Profit per Hour
